channel.title: About on A Vigilante's Pride

item.title: About Me
item.description:
I am Aviral Bajpai, pursuing Mechanical engineering and Masters in Biology from BITS Pilani, Goa Campus.

I am an enthusiast learner. In fact I just learned hugo to develop this site. I am interested in Machine learning and Artificial intelligence, although I am developing a new interest in Biology and maybe I’ll find something interesting in Mechanical as well.

Somethime about me:

  • I am an introvert, I can talk to hundreds of people online, but I stay quite when in group, I don’t usually introduce myself and would prefer reading books in my room than visiting beaches in Goa.
  • I am a night owl, I usually wake up till 2 in the morning and sometimes might not sleep the entire night.
  • I am an avid reader. Yes, I love reading and I read a lot, usually non fiction.
  • I am an engineer and hence Single.
  • Most importantly I am an enthusiastic learner. I would try to learn anything new I come across, if that seems interesting to me.
